description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). The original tank vs. tank action classic has received an Xbox Live overhaul, adding in exciting new multiplayer modes including Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. This updated version is truly a must-have for any fan of the original, which is also included. Additionally, players can use the Xbox Live Vision camera to watch live video of their opponents. Combine these features with new special effects for weapon firing, impacts and explosions and you have one killer classic as youâ€™ve never experienced it before. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
description.short: In one of the most well-known arcade games of all time, players must fight for survival. Try your hand at this classic arcade game in its Evolved form with completely re-stylized graphics, sounds and features!
